com.ibm.mobile.services.data

Class IBMDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.mobile.services.data.IBMDataObject
      • com.ibm.mobile.services.data.IBMDevice

  • public class IBMDevice
extends IBMDataObject
    IBMDevice is a specialized object representing an end device. This class is a subclass of IBMDataObject. This class holds contextual information about the device. The IBMDevice class is a provisional API. APIs that are marked provisional are evolving and might change or be removed in future releases.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.ibm.mobile.services.data.IBMDataObject
